content: this amigurumi is crocheted in cotton yarn with a 3 5 mm hook and measures aprox 11 cm long and 6 cm tall this pattern is great for beginners to intermediate crocheters that are looking for a quick and cute amigurumi to make this pattern is crocheted in a spiral and uses us terms materials - 1 yarn ball light blue blue or grey and 1 yarn ball white - a 3 5mm hook or the most fitting hook for your yarn - 1 pair of safety eyes - a thread of black yarn if you prefer to embroider the eyes - stuffing - tapestry needle and stitch marker
